824890.name: Of Guards and Thieves - Racing
824890.description:
Of Guards and Thieves - Racing includes a new Free to Play Racing game mode with three unique vehicles, new classes, skins and 5 new official racing maps.
Plus Map Editor support for Racing mode and tons of new map editor tiles that will allow you to build your racing circuits!

Racing Key Features

  • Racing game mode (Time Attack type)
  • Day & Night cycle
  • 5 New Official Racing Maps
  • Custom Map support for Racing mode
  • Map Editor integration with more than 800 new unique placeable tiles
  • 3 Unique Vehicles, Car, Quad, Kart with many color variations
  • New Racing classes
  • Different terrain type physics (Off Road / Asphalt / Dirt) with unique driving style
  • New Avatars

New Official Racing Maps

  • Driving School
  • Race Track
  • Smart Race
  • Motocross
  • Forest Rally

New Map Editor Content

  • Map Editor NEW Asphalt Roads Tileset (26 unique tiles with 4 variants - 104 in total)
  • Map Editor NEW Dirt Roads Tileset (26 unique tiles with 4 variants - 104 in total)
  • Map Editor NEW Dirt Rally Ramps (18 unique tiles with 4 variants - 72 in total)
  • Map Editor NEW Curbs Tileset (40 unique tiles with 3 color variants - 120 in total)
  • Map Editor NEW Tyre Walls Tileset (18 unique tiles with 7 color variants - 126 in total)
  • Map Editor NEW Guardrails Tileset (50 unique tiles with 4 color variants - 200 in total)
  • Map Editor NEW Metal Fences tiles (x2)
  • Map Editor MEW Tyre Trails Tileset (30 unique tiles with 3 color variants - 90 in total)
  • Map Editor NEW Ads Space tilesets (22 unique tiles)
824890.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 保加利亚语, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 瑞典语, 土耳其语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 阿拉伯语, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 匈牙利语, 韩语, 挪威语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
